title: parAmukham EnO
sahitya:
parAmukham EnO (unakkE) (enniDam unakkE)


anupallavi

  vArAdiruppAi vArangaLAi inum nI tArAgaNangaLum kaNDji viTTu vadaittiDum


caraNam    mArAda anbE enadu enrum ena nI ArAyiram kurai sonnadum EnO
yArO ouruvan pOl tanaittu ninrEnE pArO enrum pOl suhzhalum ennilai ariyAmalE
